Sudan: Al-Turabi was arrested for signing a memorandum with the SPLA.
The United Nations (UN) World Food Programme struggled to feed millions facing starvation.
The SPLA threatened to attack foreign oil workers.
Peace talks in Nairobi broke down.
Egypt and Libya proposed a peace plan for Sudan.
The UN lifted sanctions against Sudan.
United States Senator John Danforth was appointed Special Envoy to Sudan.
The United States imposed sanctions on Sudan.
